    • Method Detail

      • loadAgent

        public boolean loadAgent(java.lang.String containerName,
                AgentManager agentManager)
        Description copied from class: DefaultPlatform
        The method does nothing. The agents are ready to start anyway, as they need no platform support.

        AgentManager#setPlatformLink(PlatformLink) is not called, as no support will be offered by the platform.

        Specified by:
        loadAgent in interface PlatformLoader
        Overrides:
        loadAgent in class DefaultPlatform
        Parameters:
        containerName - - the name of the container in which to create the agent.
        agentManager - - the AgentManager handling the agent's lifecycle.
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful (meaning a subsequent call to AgentManager.start() should be able to start the agent.

      • getRecommendedComponentClass

        public java.lang.String getRecommendedComponentClass(AgentComponent.AgentComponentName componentName)
        Description copied from class: DefaultPlatform
        The loader recommends no particular implementation for any component.
        Specified by:
        getRecommendedComponentClass in interface PlatformLoader
        Overrides:
        getRecommendedComponentClass in class DefaultPlatform
        Parameters:
        componentName - - the type/name of the component to be recommended.
        Returns:
